title: 7 Tage in Havanna (2012)
description: A lesbian, an aspiring actor, an aspiring singer, a low-class marriage, a neighborhood community and 2 renowned directors have memorable less-than-24-hour-long experiences while living in/visiting the capital of Cuba.
characterList: Angelito (segments "El Yuma" - "La tentación de Cecilia" and "Dulce amargo")
Cliente Bar Silvia (segment "El Yuma") / Compañero (segment "Jam Session")
Rosa (Amiga de Novia de Angelito) (segment "El Yuma")
Muchacha Guapa Barra Rogelito (segment "El Yuma") / Amiga (segment "Ritual")
